title: Aureliano Bolognesi
text:
Aureliano Bolognesi (15 November 1930 in <a href="Sestri%20Ponente">Sestri Ponente</a>, <a href="Italy">Italy</a> – 30 March 2018 in <a href="Genoa">Genoa</a>) was an Italian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>.
Amateur career.
Bolognesi was the Lightweight gold medalist at the <a href="1952%20Helsinki%20Olympics">1952 Helsinki Olympics</a>.

Pro career.
Bolognesi turned pro in 1954 and fought mainly in Italy, and retired in 1956 having won 17, lost 2 and drawn 2 with 2 KOs.
